scripts.compile: rm -rf releases && bun run compile:darwin:arm && bun run compile:darwin:x64 && bun run compile:linux:arm && bun run compile:linux:x64 && bun run compile:windows
scripts.compile:darwin:arm: bun build --compile --bytecode ./src/index.ts ./src/worker.ts --outfile releases/darwin_arm/lokigen --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --minify && zip -j releases/macos_arm_silicon.zip releases/darwin_arm/lokigen
scripts.compile:darwin:x64: bun build --compile --bytecode ./src/index.ts ./src/worker.ts --outfile releases/darwin_x64/lokigen --target=bun-darwin-x64 --minify && zip -j releases/macos_x64_intel.zip releases/darwin_x64/lokigen
scripts.compile:linux:arm: bun build --compile --bytecode ./src/index.ts ./src/worker.ts --outfile releases/linux_arm/lokigen --target=bun-linux-arm64 --minify && zip -j releases/linux_arm.zip releases/linux_arm/lokigen
scripts.compile:linux:x64: bun build --compile --bytecode ./src/index.ts ./src/worker.ts --outfile releases/linux_x64/lokigen --target=bun-linux-x64 --minify && zip -j releases/linux_x64.zip releases/linux_x64/lokigen
scripts.compile:windows: bun build --compile --bytecode ./src/index.ts ./src/worker.ts --outfile releases/windows_x64/lokigen --target=bun-windows-x64 --minify && zip -j releases/windows_x64.zip releases/windows_x64/lokigen.exe
